LanguageData.VAERoy_Peacock.label: peacock
LanguageData.VAERoy_Peacock.description: Beautiful, majestic royal birds genetically altered to be able to bestow psychic energy onto people they nuzzle.\n\n<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> Peacocks will periodically nuzzle your colonists. This increases Psychic Sensitivity of the nuzzled person by 25% for 12 hours. This stacks up to 8 times, resulting in +200% Psychic sensitivity if nuzzled by 8 peacocks.
LanguageData.VAERoy_Peacock.tools.0.label: claws
LanguageData.VAERoy_Peacock.tools.1.label: beak
LanguageData.VAERoy_Peacock.tools.2.label: head
